title: when are we getting the pretty SG lux icon for the quizz <3?
body: quiz icon when would it be really released <3? it said 1-2 days but that passed :3

replies.body: The icon can take up to a week *at most* to show up on your account. If you still don't see it by then, please let me know!
I think it said 2-3 days after the quiz was completed so I would hang tight for now.
